typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		LOTID as string,
		SRC_LOT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	dateFormats: ['yyyy-MM-dd'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss','yyyy.MM.dd HH:mm:ss'],
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	preferredFractionalType: 'double',
	wildcardPaths:['inbound/user/fg69gy/*.gz']) ~> source2
source2 pivot(columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> Pivot1
Pivot1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
